April 12, 1957
Mr. Irvine B. Watts, Director
Phoenix Flying School
2409 East Buchanan
Hioenix, Arizona
Dear Mr. Watts:
Thank you for your letter of April 8 requesting a copy of our Tact Sheet SerÂ¬
vice Bulletin.'1 I believe you must be referring to our Fact Sheet Service
which is a continuing series at irregular intervals and includes information
regarding research into techniques of presentation, production principles
and content and audience research pertaining to both television and radio.
The charge for this service is $2.50 per year. If you start your subscription
now, you will receive all back issues of 1957.
I hope the above information is of interest to you and if you care to subscribe
to the Fact Sheet Service, please let me know.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.)Judith B. Gans
Secretary
